original_title: Justin Hayward - Live In Concert At The Capitol Theatre
overview: Justin Hayward: Live In Concert at the Capitol Theatre is the latest DVD release from the legendary Moody Blues vocalist, guitarist & composer. This intimate performance recorded in surround sound has been expertly captured by award winning filmmaker & composer David Minasian, and is truly one of Justin's finest solo performances. Many of Justin's best loved songs are included including Tuesday Afternoon, Question, Your Wildest Dreams, Forever Autumn, I Know You're Out There Somewhere, and of course Nights in White Satin along with some rarely performed deep cuts. The DVD also includes a bonus music video for Justin's latest epic composition The Wind of Heaven.
title: Justin Hayward - Live In Concert At The Capitol Theatre
